modName: A New Begining - With a little Help
summary: Give you after new Start the most needed Materials incl 25.000 Septimes
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3ADF00][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/140613/zysnymwa.png[/img]

Some weeks ago I had to find out that probably a Mod has killed all my Savegame - and arranges the most mad things in my play on which I would not simply like to come here...

Fact is: I had to begin at the 5th time completely. I have lost my actual level 84 Char only the day before yesterday, together with 2.5 million Septimes and something more...

Starting all over? »Noooooooo...«
I looked at Nexus and found this absolute Genius Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33006/?]Male and Female Clean Save Resources by Playdeadstudios[/url]. But startink with Nothing in my Pockets? No Weapon, no Armor? No, way! So i made this little File to get startet!

These small "Mod" - if one can call them so - make available to the player has only just a new started, the most important materials.

The Carryweight is raised temporarily on 2500 pounds, so that one can carry all goods comfortably.


[img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/140613/bais49te.png[/img]
1. Downlaod it WITHOUT NMM!
2. Unpack the File
3. Copy&Paste newstarting.txt to: SteamLibary/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data
4. Start your Game
5. Open up the Console an type in: bat newstarting

and you will get these:

Carryweigth temporarly set to 2500 Pound, to carry all the Starting Incredients and give you:

50 Steel Ingot
50 Iron Ingot
50 Silver Ingot
50 Corundum Ingot
50 Orichalcum Ingot
50 Ebony Ingot
50 Gold Ingot
50 Quicksilver Ingot
50 Dwarven Metal Ingot
50 Refined Malachite
50 Refined Moonstone

50 Leather
50 Leather Strips

25 Potion of Ultimate Healing

25 Black Soul Gem (full)

50 Dragon Scales
50 Dragon Bones

And 25.000 Septimes fot the first Time.

Have Fun!

Edit on 27/08/2014:
Change some little thinks...
You now get as an Extra:
1 Pickaxe
1 Poacher´s Axe (Weapon and Wood Chopping)
50 Firewood

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Schau dir auch meine anderen Mod an:

[/color][/center]
author: Testingone
